document_data.name: Ternan Grannox
document_data.mainbody: '''Ternan Grannox''' was the Lord-Mayor of [[Darromar]], the capital of [[Tethyr]].
document_data.Relationships: Ternan was the only child of councilor [[Valsin Grannox]] and was the nephew of Count [[Malcor Grannox]]. The Lord-Mayor was married to Consort [[Brenna Grannox]].
